message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both enjoy the money.
I think we can do better than that, let's meet in the middle!
I understand you want a fair deal, Bob, but time is money! This is my final offer.
Let's split the difference and walk away with a good deal, inflation is eating into my share!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. The value is literally decreasing with every second we waste! Take this deal before it depreciates further.
